General.Name: Daheng New Epoch Technology Inc
General.Description: Daheng New Epoch Technology Inc. engages in the optical-mechanical-electrical integration products, information technology and office automation products, digital TV network editing and broadcasting systems, and semiconductor components in China. Its principal products include precision optical-mechanical standard parts products; laser satellite ranging and industrial precision processing picosecond lasers; femtosecond lasers for terahertz spectrometer light source and grating etching; terahertz spectrometer TDS for material research; filter components used in the detection industry; spectroscopic components used in projection display; laser system supporting components used in laser processing; and application system products, as well as lighting products. The company also offers image acquisition and processing equipment and software, image acquisition boards, data processing boards, industrial digital cameras, smart cameras, and machine vision system, which is mainly used in the printing, packaging, food, pharmaceutical, textile, and electronics industries; and system integration products for integration, including self-developed software and hardware products, as well as outsourced related equipment and services. In addition, it provides non-linear editing system, graphic studio system, video server system, multi-screen monitoring controller system, program production network system, media asset management system, digital master control broadcasting system, and media comprehensive operation solutions, as well as engages in the sales of office equipment and consumables. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Beijing, China.
